sense.name: remove contents from; vacate
sense.examples: I've deleted some files and emptied the Recycle Bin. As the purse is emptied the heart is filled. As the Mavericks fell horribily behind, the stadium emptied slowly. You'll need to empty out your office by Monday. Empty all the marbles from this box. I emptied the seeds into my hands. The movers emptied the truck of boxes.
